title: Search for Safety
description: Ryan and Lily keep their group of survivors moving as they search for a place of safety to survive as the winter season begins.  Short on supplies and weapons to defend themselves they know it is just a matter of time before the Zombies move out of the cities and spread through the country searching for fresh prey.  Search for Safety is continues the Killing the Dead series and contains adult language, themes and violence.
author: Richard   Murray
